# Master Books of Rul Thaven (Level 17 Diviner)
## Overview
*This trio of books is bound in leather as black as a starless night, clasped together with gleaming silver. The pages are filled with notes and errata. The handwriting becomes more hurried toward the end of the trilogy, and the final page says, “I have found her!”*

**Protection** Each book features a superior lock (DC 40); *[[Secret Page (Spell)|secret page]]* hides the 9th- and 7th-level spells, and the first book is warded with *[[Explosive Runes (Spell)|explosive runes]]* (Reflex DC 17).

**Opposition Schools** Illusion, transmutation

**Value** 12,685 gp (16,510 gp with the preparation ritual)

**SPELLS**

9th—*[[Foresight (Spell)|foresight]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Freedom (Spell)|freedom]]*

8th—*[[Demand (Spell)|demand]]*, *[[Discern Location (Spell)|discern location]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Prying Eyes, Greater (Spell)|greater prying eyes]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Trap the Soul (Spell)|trap the soul]]*

7th—*[[Instant Summons (Spell)|instant summons]]*, *[[Arcane Sight, Greater (Spell)|greater arcane sight]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Scrying, Greater (Spell)|greater scrying]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Plane Shift (Spell)|plane shift]]*, *[[Vision (Spell)|vision]]* <sup>S</sup>

6th—*[[Analyze Dweomer (Spell)|analyze dweomer]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Dispel Magic, Greater (Spell)|greater dispel magic]]*, *[[Guards and Wards (Spell)|guards and wards]]*, *[[Legend Lore (Spell)|legend lore]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Repulsion (Spell)|repulsion]]*, *[[True Seeing (Spell)|true seeing]]* <sup>S</sup>

5th—*[[Contact Other Plane (Spell)|contact other plane]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Major Creation (Spell)|major creation]]*, *[[Secret Chest (Spell)|secret chest]]*, *[[Sending (Spell)|sending]]*, *[[Telepathic Bond (Spell)|telepathic bond]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Planar Adaptation (Spell)|planar adaptation]]* <sup>OP</sup>

4th—*[[Bestow Curse (Spell)|bestow curse]]*, *[[Dimensional Anchor (Spell)|dimensional anchor]]*, *[[Geas, Lesser (Spell)|lesser geas]]*, *[[Globe of Invulnerability, Lesser (Spell)|lesser globe of invulnerability]]*, *[[Locate Creature (Spell)|locate creature]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Remove Curse (Spell)|remove curse]]*, *[[Secure Shelter (Spell)|secure shelter]]*, *[[Share Senses (Spell)|share senses]]* <sup>S</sup>,

3rd—*[[Arcane Sight (Spell)|arcane sight]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Blood Biography (Spell)|blood biography]]* <sup>S</sup>, [[Clairaudience_Clairvoyance (Spell)|clairaudience/clairvoyance]] <sup>S</sup>, *[[Explosive Runes (Spell)|explosive runes]]*, *[[Secret Page (Spell)|secret page]]* <sup>OP</sup>, *seek senses* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Tongues (Spell)|tongues]]* <sup>S</sup>

2nd—*[[Continual Flame (Spell)|continual flame]]*, *[[Detect Thoughts (Spell)|detect thoughts]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Flaming Sphere (Spell)|flaming sphere]]*, *[[Hold Person (Spell)|hold person]]*, *[[Locate Object (Spell)|locate object]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Resist Energy (Spell)|resist energy]]*, *[[See Invisibility (Spell)|see invisibility]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Summon Monster II (Spell)|summon monster II]]*

1st—*[[Cause Fear (Spell)|cause fear]]*, *[[Comprehend Languages (Spell)|comprehend languages]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Detect Secret Doors (Spell)|detect secret doors]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Detect Undead (Spell)|detect undead]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Disguise Self (Spell)|disguise self]]* <sup>OP</sup>, *[[Identify (Spell)|identify]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Protection From Evil (Spell)|protection from evil]]*, *[[Protection From Law (Spell)|protection from law]]*, *[[True Strike (Spell)|true strike]]* <sup>S</sup>

**Preparation Ritual**

**Improved Eyes of Rul Thaven (Su)** This improved boon allows you to see invisible creatures. You can activate the boon’s effect as a swift action to gain the effects of *[[See Invisibility (Spell)|see invisibility]]* for up to 10 rounds. The rounds need not be consecutive, but you must spend a swift action each time you activate the boon’s effect. The boon’s effect is only spent when all 10 rounds of *[[See Invisibility (Spell)|see invisibility]]* spells.

**Source:** Ultimate Magic, pg. 126
